message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  It's important to settle this quickly before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
Alice, your sense of fairness seems a bit off. Let's be reasonable, I'll take a bit more considering the inflation working against me.
Bob, inflation is a real factor here. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need a bit more than your last offer to make it worthwhile. 55/45 is my final offer.
